document.full_text: a 16-year-old boy is under investigation for the murder of his great-grandparents, police said on thursday, the second time in a month that a young male is suspected in a family killing in rural eastern colorado.
document.title: colorado teen suspected in murder of grandparents
lines_and_colors: a 16-year-old boy is under investigation for the murder of his great-grandparents, police said on thursday, the second time in a month that a young male is suspected in a family killing in rural eastern colorado.
